alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 10:26PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Chickasaw, northern Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 1045 PM CST... At 1026 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Randolph to 10 miles east of Banner to near Bruce. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Bruce, Pittsboro, Houlka, Randolph, Thaxton, New Houlka, Algoma, Toccopola, Robbs, Thorn, Reid, Loyd, Pannell, Shepherd, Matthews, Rough Edge, Sarepta and Wallfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
